game.title: Dragon's Might
game.description: Travel to the Eldenwood forest and slay the dragon who has been terrorizing the villagers. Return with its head to prove your victory.

task.description: Get prepared and travel to the Eldenwood forest which is located to the west of our village.
Find and defeat the dragon. It's residing deep within the forest. Be careful, it’s very powerful.

task.objective: Return the Dragon Head to Mayor John
task.description: Once you've defeated the dragon, bring its head back to Mayor John as proof of your feat.
